problem_summary_simple: Convert n^2 to hexadecimal and n^3 to hexatrigesimal, then concatenate.
problem_summary_technical: Implement a general base conversion function using repeated division and modulo operations with appropriate character lookups.
key_insights: The core of the problem is implementing a robust base conversion algorithm.
Hexadecimal uses base 16 (0-9, A-F), and hexatrigesimal uses base 36 (0-9, A-Z).
The conversion process involves repeatedly taking the remainder and dividing by the base.
